abstract: United Nations Security Council calls on Pres Ali Abdullah Saleh of Yemen to immediately transfer power to his deputy and end the escalating violence in his country.
snippet: A resolution adopted by the Security Council expressed concerns about the situation in Yemen “due to the lack of progress on a political settlement.”

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )

lead_paragraph: A resolution adopted by the Security Council expressed concerns about the situation in Yemen “due to the lack of progress on a political settlement.”

headline.main: U.N. Presses Yemeni Leader to Accept Deal
headline.print_headline: U.N. Presses Yemeni Leader To Accept Deal
headline.seo: U.N. Calls on Saleh to Accept Power Transfer Deal in Yemen
